item.title: [gn3] Demon of Loathing
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Flying, trample

Whenever Demon of Loathing deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [gn3] Bushmeat Poacher
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Draw a card.

item.title: [gn3] Llanowar Elves
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add {G}.

item.title: [gn3] Demonic Embrace
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +3/+1, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types.

You may cast Demonic Embrace from your graveyard by paying 3 life and discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs.

item.title: [gn3] Doomed Dissenter
item.description:
Creature — Human

When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [gn3] Doom Blade
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target nonblack creature.

item.title: [gn3] Gifted Aetherborn
item.description:
Creature — Aetherborn Vampire

Deathtouch, lifelink

item.title: [gn3] Gavony Unhallowed
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gavony Unhallowed.

item.title: [gn3] Dusk Legion Zealot
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Soldier

When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [gn3] Priest of the Blood Rite
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

When Priest of the Blood Rite enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.

item.title: [gn3] Moan of the Unhallowed
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [gn3] Maalfeld Twins
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Maalfeld Twins dies, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

item.title: [gn3] Howling Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

Whenever Howling Golem attacks or blocks, each player draws a card.

item.title: [gn3] Gravewaker
item.description:
Creature — Bird Spirit

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

{5}{B}{B}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [gn3] Reassembling Skeleton
item.description:
Creature — Skeleton Warrior

{1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [gn3] Ravenous Chupacabra
item.description:
Creature — Beast Horror

When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

item.title: [gn3] Plains
item.description:
Basic Land — Plains

({T}: Add {W}.)

item.title: [gn3] Supernatural Stamina
item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

item.title: [gn3] Sign in Blood
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

item.title: [gn3] Village Rites
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Draw two cards.

item.title: [gn3] Vilis, Broker of Blood
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying

{B}, Pay 2 life: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

Whenever you lose life, draw that many cards. (Damage causes loss of life.)

item.title: [gn3] Swamp
item.description:
Basic Land — Swamp

({T}: Add {B}.)

item.title: [gn3] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [gn3] Zombify
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [gn3] Vow of Torment
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has menace, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [gn3] Mountain
item.description:
Basic Land — Mountain

({T}: Add {R}.)

item.title: [gn3] Ancient Hellkite
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{R}: Ancient Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls. Activate only if Ancient Hellkite is attacking.

item.title: [gn3] Abrade
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.

• Destroy target artifact.

item.title: [gn3] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [gn3] Dragon Mage
item.description:
Creature — Dragon Wizard

Flying

Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

item.title: [gn3] Dragon Hatchling
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Dragon Egg
item.description:
Creature — Dragon Egg

Defender

When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

item.title: [gn3] Crucible of Fire
item.description:
Enchantment

Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.

item.title: [gn3] Blaze
item.description:
Sorcery

Blaze deals X damage to any target.

item.title: [gn3] Flametongue Kavu
item.description:
Creature — Kavu

When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

item.title: [gn3] Flameblast Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to any target.

item.title: [gn3] Drakuseth, Maw of Flames
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Drakuseth, Maw of Flames attacks, it deals 4 damage to any target and 3 damage to each of up to two other targets.

item.title: [gn3] Dragon Tempest
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

item.title: [gn3] Dragonspeaker Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Human Barbarian Shaman

Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

item.title: [gn3] Knollspine Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Knollspine Dragon enters the battlefield, you may discard your hand and draw cards equal to the damage dealt to target opponent this turn.

item.title: [gn3] Kargan Dragonrider
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

As long as you control a Dragon, Kargan Dragonrider has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

item.title: [gn3] Goblin Motivator
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Warrior

{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

item.title: [gn3] Furnace Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Shivan Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Seize the Spoils
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [gn3] Rapacious Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Rapacious Dragon enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [gn3] Mana Geyser
item.description:
Sorcery

Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.

item.title: [gn3] Lightning Bolt
item.description:
Instant

Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [gn3] Vow of Lightning
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

item.title: [gn3] Elven Ambush
item.description:
Instant

Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.
